short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 18/10/2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: This solicitation is for Aircraft Charter Services.
full_summary: ====================================== ## Aircraft Charter Services [ ](#_markdown_header_tender-information): Tender Information [ ](#_markdown_header_supplementary-information): Supplementary Information ### Tender Information #### Solicitation Details ----------------------------------- * **Solicitation Number**: WS3753315787 * **Reference Number**: WS3753315787-DOC4001332488 * **Amendment Number**: 1 * **Publication Date**: 2023-05-09 * **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-19T14:00:00 EST (Updated) * **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-01 * **Expected Contract End Date**: 2028-05-31 #### Tender Details ---------------------- * **Procurement Category**: SRV * **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes) * **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner) * **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas) #### Trade Agreements ---------------------- * **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * **Country**: #### Locations ------------------ * **Regions of Opportunity**: None * **Regions of Delivery**: Canada * **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada #### Contact Information ------------------------- * **Contact Person**: Glover, Kingsley (SPAC/PSPC) * **Contact Email**: kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca * **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16220020 ### Supplementary Information #### Tender Status ---------------- * **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired) #### Service Details ------------------- * **Service**: Aircraft Charter Services (Services d'affrètement aérien) * **Description**: This solicitation is amendments the closing time.
